de.uzk.hki.da.service

Class UpdateMetadataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uzk.hki.da.service.UpdateMetadataService

  • public class UpdateMetadataService
extends Object
    Provides several functions that deal with metadata changes that are necessary after file conversions.
    Author:
    Sebastian Cuy

      • updatePathsInMetadata

        public void updatePathsInMetadata(Package pkg,
                         String packageType,
                         String metadataFilePath,
                         String repName,
                         String absUrlPrefix)
        Update paths in a packages metadata.
        Parameters:
        pkg - the current package
        packageType - the metadata type of the package
        metadataFilePath - the metadata file path
        repName - the representation affected
        absUrlPrefix - a prefix for generating absolute URLs, can be null
